summary: Dr. Kofi Etruw Shaw-Taylor's medical license was summarily suspended due to extensive findings of overprescribing opioids and benzodiazepines, practicing pain management outside his scope of training, and surgical complications. Allegations also included poor medical record-keeping, an unprofessional and chaotic office environment, and failure to comply with Board subpoenas, collectively posing a substantial risk to public health and safety.
